feed.title: Today I Learned - @rsletta
feed.subtitle: A reference of stuff I've picked up along the way

entry.title: Proxmox trying to acquire lock to stop VM - fix error
entry.content:
trying to acquire lock...
TASK ERROR: can't lock file '/var/lock/qemu-server/lock-<VM id>.conf' - got timeout

rm /var/lock/qemu-server/lock-<VM id>.conf

entry.title: Copy public key to remote server
Turn of IPv6 Raspian Strech install
entry.content:
Edit /etc/sysctl.conf.

```vim net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1

Save

Modify kernel parameters

bash ~ $ sudo sysctl -p ```

entry.title: Fix DNS issues on fresh Raspian Strech install
Install NVM with Homebrew
entry.content:
• Install NVM brew install nvm

  • Add NVM folder mkdir ~/.nvm

  • Add config to .bashprofile export NVMDIR="$HOME/.nvm" . "/usr/local/opt/nvm/nvm.sh"

entry.title: Manage multiple Docker instances using Portainer agent
entry.content:
Run instance of portainer agent on docker instance

docker run -d -p 9001:9001 --name portainer_agent --restart=always -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v /var/lib/docker/volumes:/var/lib/docker/volumes portainer/agent

Configure endpoint in Portainer on management instance

entry.title: Keyboard identified wrong
entry.content:
If the keyboard has been identified wrong, for example ISO kb as ANSI kb

sudo rm /Library/Preferences/com.apple.keyboardtype.plist

Reboot - Use keybord assistant

entry.title: Rewrite commit author in Git repo
entry.content:
#!/bin/sh

git filter-branch --env-filter '

OLD_EMAIL="Wrong user e-mail"
CORRECT_NAME="User name"
CORRECT_EMAIL="User e-mail"

if [ "$GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL" = "$OLD_EMAIL" ]
then
    export GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="$CORRECT_NAME"
    export GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="$CORRECT_EMAIL"
fi
if [ "$GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL" = "$OLD_EMAIL" ]
then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_NAME="$CORRECT_NAME"
    export GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL="$CORRECT_EMAIL"
fi
' --tag-name-filter cat -- --branches --tags

entry.title: Enable 2FA and access github repo
entry.content: When 2FA is enabled, one must create a personal access token, and use that as password. Remote repo must be on HTTPS, not SSH. Using two-factor authentication with the command line

entry.title: Fix commit author with git amend
Extract git commit messages since <commit>
entry.content:
To quickly get list of events. Usefull for release notes etc…

git log --format=%B <commit hash>..HEAD > filename.ext

entry.title: PlantUML icons
entry.content:
• PlantUML Office
  • Cloudinsight PlantUML sprites
  • Open Iconic
  • Material Design
  • AWS PlantUML

Examples

Default (Open Iconic)

@startuml
listopeniconic
@enduml

Devicons / Font-awesome

@startuml

' Include common to use icon macros.
!include <devicons/common>
' Include icon from Devicons.
!include <devicons/github>
' Include icon from Font Awesome icons.
!include <font-awesome/gitlab>

' Use macros from common library.
' First argument is alias, second label.
DEV_GITHUB(github, 'Github')
FA_GITLAB(gitlab, 'Gitlab')

' Use ~ to escape #
github -> gitlab : ~#movingtogitlab

@enduml
